original_text: It is like that with people who serve God as their Master. People who keep themselves clean from those bad things will be like valuable dishes. Their master can use them for a special purpose. They will be ready for him to use them for every kind of good work.
korean_text: 그러므로 누구든지 이런 것에서 자기를 깨끗하게 하면 귀히 쓰는 그릇이 되어 거룩하고 주인의 쓰심에 합당하며 모든 선한 일에 준비함이 되리라

sentences.original_text: It is like that with people
who serve God as their Master

sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 주인은 그들을 사용할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They will be ready for him
to use them for every kind of good work
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 종류의 선한 일을 위해 그들을 사용하도록
